description:
Do you want to know how to offer your own Website Builder Services similar to companies such as Weebly or Wix?

Do you want to know how to Rebrand your Website Builder in your own Company Name?

Do you want to resell Website Builder Services and make a profit?

If you said â€œYES" to any of these questions, this course is for you!

In this course, I'll first explain what a Website Builder is and why they've become so popular in the recent years. Next, I'll show you how to choose the right web hosting platform and configure your Website Builder plans on your server. Then, I'll lead you step-by-step on how to automate the entire Website Builder sign-up process. Finally, I'll show you how to edit and upload a web template that offers Website Builder Services to end-customers.

Please note: throughout this course, you'll be required to purchase a web hosting plan and a Cpanel, SitePro, and WHMCS license.

In a little over an hour, you'll learn How to Launch Your Own Website Builder Service!
title: How to Launch Your Own Website Builder Service
